name: Night of Monsters Alpha 1 [DEMO]
description:
A small Survival Game inspired by Vampire Survivors.

Infos for this Alpha 1 Version:
5 of 12 playable Chars (2 Start Chars + 3 unlockable) -every char is playable and don't need to be unlocked for this Demo. Every Char has his own CORE Ability and can combine it with up to 3 Spells

3unlocked Spell Slots to use

7unlocked Spells to use

only 1 playable Stage with rng Monster Spawns.

Infinite Level Time

Game Restarts at dead!
